author: malcolm
msg: Test suite: Add main.file_read() to parallel main.file_write(), and use it
instead of open/read/close or open(path).read() patterns.
Also use binary mode to read and write binary files (specifically, theta.bin).
(file_read): New, as a parallel to file_write().
(dont_diff_binary_file): Use main.file_read().  Also read and write the
(update_binary_file, update_binary_file_2): Ditto, and read and write the
merge_binary_with_common_ancestry): Ditto, and read and write the binary
